languages.text: "Ты уважал маршала. Его преступление, должно быть, удар для тебя".
"I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
languages.original_text: "Ты уважал маршала. Его преступление, должно быть, удар для тебя".

traits.locale_text: "I know you respected the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
"I know you respected the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
"I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
"I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
"I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."
"I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

languages.text: 「君が将帥を深く尊敬していたことは知っている。彼の罪は、君にとって大きな衝撃だったに違いない」
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: 「君が将帥を深く尊敬していたことは知っている。彼の罪は、君にとって大きな衝撃だったに違いない」

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass Ihr großen Respekt vor dem Marschall empfunden habt. Sein Verbrechen muss ein Schlag für Euch gewesen sein."
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass Ihr großen Respekt vor dem Marschall empfunden habt. Sein Verbrechen muss ein Schlag für Euch gewesen sein."

languages.text: « Je sais que vous teniez le maréchal en haute estime. Son crime a dû être un véritable choc pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que vous teniez le maréchal en haute estime. Son crime a dû être un véritable choc pour vous. »

languages.text: «Sé lo mucho que respetaba al mariscal. Imagino que su crimen le habrá supuesto un duro golpe».
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: «Sé lo mucho que respetaba al mariscal. Imagino que su crimen le habrá supuesto un duro golpe».

languages.text: “我知道你很尊重元帅这个人。对你来说，他的罪行肯定是个不小的打击。”
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: “我知道你很尊重元帅这个人。对你来说，他的罪行肯定是个不小的打击。”

languages.text: "Miralay'a büyük saygı beslediğinin farkındayım. İşlediği suç, sana tokat gibi gelir."
languages.original_text: "I know you had great respect for the Marshal. His crime must have come as a blow to you."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay'a büyük saygı beslediğinin farkındayım. İşlediği suç, sana tokat gibi gelir."
